message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I think I deserve a little more since you rejected my 50/50 offer. Let's be fair and I'll take 60%.
You wanted more, now you'll get less. I'll take the majority this time.
Let's compromise.  I'll take a slightly larger share, but I think this is a fair deal after your last offer.
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything.
I think we're both being stubborn.  Let's go back to my previous offer - it's the most fair way to split the money at this point.
